meanings.definition: To set free or let loose.
meanings.sent1: The magician loosed the doves into the sky during the show.
meanings.sent2: She loosed her grip on the kite, sending it soaring into the air.
meanings.sent3: He loosed a barrage of jokes at the party, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The storm loosed its fury upon the unsuspecting town.
meanings.sent5: The hero loosed an arrow, hitting the target with precision.
